name: New Super Can Bros (UP2015784)
description:
A Super Mario themed stacker game with an ending. 

Reach the top of the flag pole to save Princess Can and win the game. 

Includes a fully working menu with adjustable music settings.

Left Click - Drop Can

Scroll wheel in and out to get a better view of your tower

Escape to return to menu

Note - There are two issues with the game one was an  issue before building the game which I couldn't fix, another was a small issue that came after the game  was built. 

The first issue is if your tower falls at precisely the time the camera pans up the game doesn't restart allowing the player to continue.

(Let it be known if you abuse this you are a cheater and are the kind of person to install aim bot for Call Of Duty Warzone)

The second issue isn't really an issue the can can sometimes get stuck on the left or right of the screen this rarely happens but if it does allow the can to free itself (usually takes 1 to 2 seconds)

Lastly thank you for checking out my page  and please don't roast me to hard in the comments. This is my first properly published game after all.
